title: Mercedes : market share of new car registrations in the EU 2019
summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
The difference of Market share between the highest and lowest Month is 2.6.
min_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 17 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Market share in each Month on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 17 number of Months.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Month Sep 18 and lowest at Month Aug 18.
The highest Month Sep 18 has 2.6 more Market share than the lowest Month Aug 18.
Month Sep 18 is higher than any other Months with value 7.2, followed by Sep 19, and Oct 18. Down to Month Aug 18 with the lowest value 4.6.
Over the past 17 Months, the Market share has decreased.
Month May 19, Feb 19, and Jan 19 have the same Market share.
The Month Sep 18 tends to be 1.23 percent higher than average.
